projects: [{"title":"Audubon Street Project","start_date":"Jun 2014","end_date":"Jun 2014","description":"Project at the Yale School of Management aimed at developing a business concept for a new business venture on Audubon street, including financials (and expected return of investment), marketing and operations, risks involved, etc."},{},{},{},{},{},{"title":"Traffic Management at Toll Booths","start_date":"May 2013","end_date":"May 2014","description":"Application of Queuing Theory for management of heavy traffic on toll booths on highways in Delhi-NCR; Devised strategies to improve efficiency of toll booths in terms of delays incurred"},{},{"title":"Calculating Options Price using Monte Carlo Simulation","start_date":"Jan 2013","end_date":"May 2013","description":"Simulated scenarios of a stock price following the Standard Weiner processModelled binary variations in stock price for user-defined number of time periods"},{"title":"Entry Strategy in IVF: An Exploratory Study","start_date":"Jan 2013","end_date":"May 2013","description":"Wrote a research paper to outline a strategy to identify factors affecting entries of players in the IVF sector using Delphi Technique and mapping the above identified factors on a cross-country basis using Scenario Planning; Awarded Outstanding grade by the supervisor"},{},{},{"title":"Self-Assistive Toilet Seat Lifter for Aged","start_date":"Jan 2013","end_date":"May 2013","description":"Designed, manufactured and assembled an innovative, novel, and inexpensive mechanical mechanism using suspension springs to help aged people get up from toilet seats."},{},{},{},{},{"title":"Improving Grindability of Titanium Alloys using Nano-Lubricants","start_date":"May 2012","end_date":"Sep 2012","description":"Awarded the Summer Undergraduate Research Award for the projectDesigned, manufactured and assembled a suitable Minimum Quantity Lubrication setup;Enhanced the grinding characteristics of titanium alloys by experimenting using carbon nanotubes;Formulated mathematical models using MINITAB software and solved them using regression analysis"},{},{"title":"Sun Tracking Solar Panel","start_date":"Jan 2012","end_date":"May 2012","description":"Increased efficiency of solar panels by 30% by enabling them to constantly track the sun. Designed and fabricated an innovative mechanism using photo sensors."},{},{},{},{}]
